apiTopics.GET /api/articles: Responds with an array of topic objects

apiArticles.GET /api/articles: Responds with an articles array of article objects and accepts queries
apiArticles.GET /api/articles/:article_id: Responds with an article object based on ID
apiArticles.PATCH /api/articles/:article_id: Request body accepts an object { inc_votes: newVote } to increment vote
apiArticles.GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments: Responds with an array of comments for the given article_id

apiComments.PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id: Request body accepts an object { inc_votes: newVote } to increment vote
apiComments.DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id: Should delete the given comment by comment_id. Responds with status 204 and no content

apiUsers.GET /api/users: Responds with an array of user objects

apiInfo.GET /api: Responds with JSON describing all the available endpoints on your API
